com.procom.filefly

Class MainActivity

extends java.lang.Object

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  MainActivity.SectionsPagerAdapter
      A FragmentPagerAdapter that returns a fragment corresponding to one of the sections/tabs/pages.

    • Field Detail

      • mSectionsPagerAdapter

        private MainActivity.SectionsPagerAdapter mSectionsPagerAdapter
        The PagerAdapter that will provide fragments for each of the sections. We use a FragmentPagerAdapter derivative, which will keep every loaded fragment in memory. If this becomes too memory intensive, it may be best to switch to a FragmentStatePagerAdapter.

      • mSenderFragment

        private Fragment mSenderFragment

      • mDocumentListFragment

        private Fragment mDocumentListFragment

      • mViewPager

        android.support.v4.view.ViewPager mViewPager
        The ViewPager that will host the section contents.

    • Method Detail

      • onCreate

        protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)

      • onStart

        protected void onStart()
        Handles verifying access to external storage and creates necessary directories once write access has been verified by calling onStart().

        This method is called after #onCreate() in the Activity lifecycle.

      • onCreateOptionsMenu

        public boolean onCreateOptionsMenu(Menu menu)

        private void createDirectories()

      • closeKeyboard

        public void closeKeyboard()
        Simple method to close the keyboard. Known callers: MainActivity.onPageScrollStateChanged(), SendFragment.onClick()
